author: rahul
msg: Enable JavaScript as one of the pluggable ELs in SCXML documents:
* Added new env.javascript package to hold the necessary javax.script bindings, and corresponding context and evaluator impls.
* Includes JUnit tests and a sample using JavaScript as the EL.
TODO: m2 build does not execute javascript package tests, TBD why.
Contributed by (and thanks to): Tony Seebregts <tony at iveri dot com>
* Also added Tony to list of contributors in pom files.

author: rahul
msg: Expand the scope of this branch to JDK 1.6 (for useful features such as javax.script, see SCXML-68, for example).

author: dims
msg: working on AXIS2-2550, add support for simple map with key/value in addition to using Header's. Still researching changes on jaxws side for that bug
